entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 12.
entry.summary: Showers ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. A few showers near the British Columbia border late this afternoon. Local amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 this morning then west 60 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:37 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few showers near the British Columbia border this evening. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:37 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level 1500 metres. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:37 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
